text: " stop ! " faltered dorian gray , " stop ! you bewilder me . i do n't know what to say . there is some answer to you , but i can not find it . do n't speak . let me think . or , rather , let me try not to think . "
let us get ready , gentlemen . "
allow me , then , to avoid dishonor by death ; let me take refuge in martyrdom .
i supplicate you , i implore you on my knees -- let me die , and my last sigh shall be a blessing for my preserver . "
" oh , a day and night soon pass away . let us return to the object that brings me here . "
let me conduct your business and my own .
" let us go on with our search , then , " returned cyrus harding .
" mr . rochester , i have just discovered the sun is far declined from its meridian , and pilot is actually gone home to his dinner . let me look at your watch . "
" let us go , " said she , " i place full confidence in you , my friend ! "

" he must have been holding it as a signal , " said i. " let us see if there is any answer . " i held it as he had done , and stared out into the darkness of the night . vaguely i could discern the black bank of the trees and the lighter expanse of the moor , for the moon was behind the clouds . and then i gave a cry of exultation , for a tiny pin - point of yellow light had suddenly transfixed the dark veil , and glowed steadily in the centre of the black square framed by the window .
" now that i know everything , my friend ! ah ! that 's very good . but go on , go on . first , though , let me tell you that those gentlemen have put themselves to a useless expense . "

a brisk breeze arose about ten o'clock ; but , though it might have been prudent to take in a reef , the pilot , after carefully examining the heavens , let the craft remain rigged as before . the tankadere bore sail admirably , as she drew a great deal of water , and everything was prepared for high speed in case of a gale .

let the man go , d’artagnan ; let us save the woman . "

dorian said nothing , but rose from the table , and passing into the next room , sat down to the piano and let his fingers stray across the white and black ivory of the keys . after the coffee had been brought in , he stopped , and looking over at lord henry , said , " harry , did it ever occur to you that basil was murdered ? "
" let me reflect a little ! ay , that will do -- at armentieres . "

but before beginning our search again let us go on board the ' bonadventure ' . "

leave your hold , then , i beg of you , and let me go where my business calls me . "
